title: Strangled, beaten and enslaved by my in-laws
description: "Sara" was told if she left the house, she would be attacked and raped by British people.
content:
Isolated and alone, Sara says she felt powerless when the husband she was forced to marry in Pakistan became abusive. She was 21.
